
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52066200">
<br>
 <a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://cloud.189.cn/t/BBB73i3UZJFz" target="_blank">https://cloud.189.cn/t/BBB73i3UZJFz</a><br>
<br>
<br>
<strong>【内容简介】</strong>初入洪荒，化身红云，开局就送百万亿功德。明白因果，成为鸿钧座下大弟子，证道圣人，开道场，收龙族，万仙归附。“三花聚顶？花开九品？千万功德！给我开！”“孔宣，你要斩尸成圣？一千万功德拿去不谢！”“女娲妹妹，你的功德不够了？我有！”“小妲己，老爷给你五百万功德，你给老爷暖床好不好？”<br>
<img id="aimg_Ho2al" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://r2.leaves.red/2024/11/29/6749c6ef65a8a.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://r2.leaves.red/2024/11/29/6749c6ef65a8a.jpg"></td></tr></tbody></table>
